section_name: Ethanol and Carbon Capture Income Statement
section_description: Please pull the Projected income statement for the Ethanol and Carbon Capture Segment. Please pull every row and line item. Also include all the incremental EBITDA from the tax credit adjustments - I want it to go all the way to the bottom to row 25 on the document I provided.
requirements: The output must be structured as a table with rows and columns, not narrative text.
The Income Statement must contain exactly 25 rows as defined in the source exhibits, from Total Net Sales through Total Consolidated EBITDA.
All line items must match the source document exactly, including formatting and numerical values.
All incremental EBITDA items from tax credit adjustments must be included (45Q, 45Z, LCFS, CHP, Eden IQ).
The response must include citations to the source document showing where each data point was extracted from.

description: Test case for revenue breakdown analysis
section_description: Provide a detailed breakdown of revenue by segment and geography. Include year-over-year growth rates and key trends.
requirements: The response must be in narrative text format, not a table.
Revenue breakdown must include all geographic segments mentioned in the source document.
Year-over-year growth rates must be calculated and presented accurately with specific percentages.
